column5: Great for the short or long-term traveller a quite and private place to relax. The setting is in our fenced back garden area amongst the trees. For those traveling with rodeo, stock, horses or dogs, special arrangements can be provided. Including Stock Trailer, Temporary Dog Kenneling and Stock Pens on our 6 acres. Near (Grand Parkway (TX99) & IAH international. Great for weekend or longer stays, we are here to service your Home away from Home needs.
column8: Pine Meadows BnB Welcomes Guest's Horses Or Dogs
